import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import Card from'react-bootstrap/Card';import{addcontext}from'../Components/ContextShare';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const{addthings,setaddthings,addwish,setaddwish}=useContext(addcontext);const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{const firstFiveProducts=data.slice(10,20);setProducts(firstFiveProducts);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching data:',error);});},[]);const handleCart=(e,product)=>{e.preventDefault();setaddthings([...addthings,product]);};const handleWish=(e,product)=>{e.preventDefault();setaddwish([...addwish,product]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:'auto'},className:"bg-dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'auto',height:'auto'},className:"p-5 bg-dark d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center justify-content-around flex-wrap",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{style:{width:'18rem',height:'auto',marginBottom:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{variant:"top",style:{width:'100%',height:'250px'},src:product.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{class:"overflow-hidden",style:{width:'100%',height:'100px'},children:product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Price : ",product.price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:e=>handleWish(e,product),children:"Add to Wishlist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:e=>handleCart(e,product),className:"mt-3",variant:"primary",children:"Add to cart"})]})]})]},product.id))})})});}export default Home;
